tag_list: marketing, social-media, start-up, advertising, research, technology, software
overview:
Rachelle is a marketing professional with experience in social media, market research, product design, lead generation and entertainment/gaming advertising.

Originally from the East Coast, Rachelle came to California for college and attended Santa Clara University; a Jesuit school in the heart of Silicon Valley. After graduation Rachelle joined Flashfoto, Inc and has been there since.

Flashfoto, Inc. is a photo editing software start up company located in Los Gatos, California. Backed by Acuity Ventures, Flashfoto is a marketing solution provider. With technology built using face point recognition (over 60 unique points) and segmentation, Flashfoto offers a comprehensive suite of marketing possibilities.
